description: text that does not begin or end with whitespace
a single word: letters, numbers, underscore
an NCBI Taxonomy ID: a natural number
an IEDB Taxonomy ID: a natural number greather than or equal to 10,000,000
a comma-separated list of IEDB Taxonomy IDs
an NCBI or IEDB taxon, or OBI 'organism'
a CURIE for a NCBI or IEDB taxon, or OBI 'organism'
the level of the taxon in the tree: upper, species, lower
